response.overview: Now an adult seeking to get past childhood trauma, Jahmir opens up to psychologist Dana, sharing details and painting images of horrific past encounters with his adopted Duke family. At first he has a strong sense of déjà vu and is slow to connect due to trust, then he embraces comfort in his sessions, finally leading into a disturbing epiphany of the worst kind. Battling memory loss and "Thought Blocking", he somehow is not aware - or is he - of the twisted façade Dana presents and the revelation of a gruesome family operation that has him connected far more than ever expected.
response.title: Finger Licking
